export.tooltip: Export current settings. (Please be careful when handling personal information during transfer.)

import.tooltip: Import settings from JSON file. (JavaScript is executed on import! Please beware of malicious scripts.)

selection_type.label: Selection Type
selection_type.directories_tooltip: Select a directory → Parallel conversion (preserves directory structure)
selection_type.files_tooltip: Select files → Batch convert to output directory
selection_type.tree_tooltip: Select a directory → Choose files to convert → Parallel conversion (preserves directory structure)

css_preset.list_tooltip: You can choose a CSS preset.

custom_js.auto_run_tooltip: Automatically run JavaScript on every page transition. (If disabled, it reloads automatically to apply settings.)
custom_js.auto_run_tooltip_note: This setting activates only if manually enabled.
custom_js.js_label: JavaScript to run on each page transition (only with permission)

import_language.tooltip: Import any language from JSON file. (Automatically reloads for validation.)
import_language.tooltip_invalid_json: Note: For invalid JSON, fallback to English. (See Wiki for JSON format.)

log_level.tooltip_summary: Lower log levels include higher severity levels. (e.g. Error ⊂ Info)
log_level.tooltip_debug: Debug: Logs data during conversion process.

log.open_file_tooltip: Open current log file. (Creates new log file on each launch.)
